body: BTW, it's doubly bad to pass a non-const reference, because you can accidentally silently mutate the IntList in the enclosing scope, which is basically never what you want.
body_html: BTW, it's doubly bad to pass a non-const reference, because you can accidentally silently mutate the IntList in the enclosing scope, which is basically never what you want.
body_text: BTW, it's doubly bad to pass a non-const reference, because you can accidentally silently mutate the IntList in the enclosing scope, which is basically never what you want.
